section.p: The Immunizations Section contains information describing the immunizations administered to the patient.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Immunizations Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.23)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.13)
SHALL conform to CCD Medications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.8)
SHALL conform to CCD Immunizations Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)
SHALL conform to IHE Immunizations Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11369-6" History of immunizations (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-377)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF-298), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.34)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.13)

SHOULD satisfy: Clinical statements include one or more Medication Activity and/or one or more Supply Activity. (CONF-298)
[OCL]: self.getSubstanceAdministrations()->exists(activity : cda::SubstanceAdministration | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::MedicationActivity)) or self.getSupplies()->exists(activity : cda::Supply | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::SupplyActivity))
SHALL satisfy: The absence of known medications is explicitly asserted. (CONF-299)
SHOULD satisfy: Valued with a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'medication'. (CONF-303)
SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'immunization'. (CONF-380)
